title: Bank of America Joins Issuance Rush With $7 Billion of Bonds
description: Bank of America Corp. priced $7 billion sale of investment-grade bonds, adding to a flurry of offerings by major Wall Street banks.
content: Bank of America Corp. priced $7 billion sale of investment-grade bonds, adding to a flurry of offerings by major Wall Street banks.
